history.input:
I J R N : set

A[I,J] :-
  ψ ↦ fix (θ : I×J→R) (i:I) (j:J) ↦ min ⟨ψ i j,
                                 θ (i-1) (j-1) + S i j,
                                 min (q ↦ θ i q + (w : J×J∩<₂→R) q j),
                                 min (p ↦ θ p j + (w' : I×I∩<₁→R) p i)⟩

I₀ I₁ ⊆ I
J₀ J₁ ⊆ J

Slice (find (θ ↦ ?)) ⟨`?×I₀×J₀, `?×I₀×J₁, `?×I₁×J₀, `?×I₁×J₁⟩

⟨Slice (find 🄰 (q ↦ ?)) ⟨`J₀, `J₁⟩,
 Slice (find 🄰 (p ↦ ?)) ⟨`I₀, `I₁⟩,
 Slice 🄵 θ (⟨`I₀,`I₁⟩ ⟨`J₀,`J₁⟩) min,  // Slice-and-Dice
 Slice (find 🄱 (p ↦ ?)) ⟨`I₀,`I₁⟩,
 Slice 🄹 θ (⟨`I₀,`I₁⟩ `?) min,
 Slice (find 🄲 (q ↦ ?)) ⟨`J₀,`J₁⟩,
 Slice 🄽 θ (`? ⟨`J₀,`J₁⟩) min⟩

⟨Stratify min (fixee 🄰) ⟨🄴,🄵⟩ ψ,
 Stratify min (fixee 🄱) ⟨🄽,🄾,🅁⟩ ψ,
 Stratify min (fixee 🄲) ⟨🅃,🅄,🅆⟩ ψ⟩

B[I,J₀,J₁] :-
  ψ ↦ (ψ : I×J₀→R) / 
       ((i j ↦ min ⟨ψ i j, 
                    ψ (i-1 : I) (j-1 : J₀) + S i j,
                    min ((q:J₀) ↦ ψ i q + w q j)⟩) : I×J₁→R)

L₀ L₁ ⊆ J₀
L₂ L₃ ⊆ J₁

Slice 🄰 (⟨`I₀,`I₁⟩ ⟨`L₂,`L₃⟩)

⟨Slice 🄵 ψ ⟨`I₀×?, `I₁×L₀, `I₁×L₁⟩ min,
 Slice 🄸 ψ ⟨`I₀×?, `I₁×L₀, `I₁×L₁⟩ min,
 Slice 🄻 ψ (`? ⟨`L₀,`L₁⟩) min,
 Slice 🄾 ψ (`? ⟨`L₀,`L₁⟩) min,
 Slice (findAll (q ↦ ?)) ⟨`L₀,`L₁⟩ ⟩

⟨Let min (slasher 🄰) ⟨🄶,🄷,🄹⟩ ψ,
 Let min (slasher 🄲) ⟨🄽,🄾,🅀⟩ ψ,
 Let min (slasher 🄴) ⟨🅄,🅅,🅇⟩ ψ,
 Let min (slasher 🄵) ⟨🅉,🄰̲,🄲̲⟩ ψ⟩

C[I₀,I₁,J] :-
  ψ ↦ (ψ : I₀×J→R) / 
       ((i j ↦ min ⟨ψ i j, 
                    ψ (i-1 : I₀) (j-1 : J) + S i j,
                    min ((p:I₀) ↦ ψ p j + w' p i)⟩) : I₁×J→R)

K₀ K₁ ⊆ I₀
K₂ K₃ ⊆ I₁
Slice 🄰 (⟨`K₂,`K₃⟩ ⟨`J₀,`J₁⟩)

⟨Slice 🄵 ψ ⟨`?×J₀, `K₀×J₁, `K₁×J₁⟩ min,
 Slice 🄸 ψ (⟨`K₀,`K₁⟩ `?) min,
 Slice 🄻 ψ ⟨`?×J₀, `K₀×J₁, `K₁×J₁⟩ min,
 Slice 🄾 ψ (⟨`K₀,`K₁⟩ `?) min,
 Slice (findAll (p ↦ ?)) ⟨`K₀,`K₁⟩ ⟩

⟨Let min (slasher 🄰) ⟨🄶,🄷,🄹⟩ ψ,
 Let min (slasher 🄲) ⟨🄽,🄾,🅀⟩ ψ,
 Let min (slasher 🄳) ⟨🅂,🅃,🅅⟩ ψ,
 Let min (slasher 🄵) ⟨🅉,🄰̲,🄲̲⟩ ψ⟩
